local_intent: Verify that the grasp pose key 'goal_pose' is available; if not, detect the bottle and compute the side grasp pose, then verify.
assumptions: DetectObject can localize 'green_glass_bottle' in this frame
ComputeGraspPose will publish the pose under key 'goal_pose' using strategy 'side'
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around PoseAvailable by reusing DetectObject and ComputeGraspPose with target 'green_glass_bottle', strategy 'side', and result_key 'goal_pose'.
